column4: ok.. think it'll be better if i repartition the SATA drive? right now it has a 10gig xp partition
gotcha
xp is already installed
yes draken
i have the dvd, i was playing around with it a few weeks ago
so i just boot off it... ill make a fat32 partition just in case on the primary sata drive
now another question
what's this nonsense about ubuntu not having any development tools (heard it from a friend who runs debian)
he says i wont be able to download/compile proggies, other than executables
nonsense?
totally nonsense
it's just not installed by default, but of course it's avaialable
apt-get install build-essential
that install the basic required packages for development
exactly ;)
look at the devs's profiles around on ubuntu. most of them are die-hard debian devs.
so far, ubuntu is causing improvement of the Debian system
yes
they had to change their names, after being sued by MS
- i know, i remember when they changed their name
a big part of our work in universe is to merge Debian packages in Ubuntu and help merge Ubuntu packages in Debian.
we want to improve the whole thing, while keeping as cloes to Debian as possible.
gnome for ubuntu, kde for kubuntu, xfce for xubuntu
anyway, ubuntu, kubuntu and xubuntu are not different system, they only diff by a few packages and can be turned to one another.
